casebody.data:
STATE
v.
CHEKANOW and Bishop 390P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2016 J. Clark Fischer, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Chekanow, Linda Beth, et al. *253Adrian Dellinger, Associate Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of October 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of October 2016."
